NF.Q: Which countries in the ridgeline chart have ridgeline peaks exceed 5722? Please list the countries and corresponding peak values.
NF.A: {Shopping}'s peak at {7037},{Transportation}'s peak at {8408},{Nightlife}'s peak at {7868}

NF.Q: Which countries in the ridgeline chart have ridgeline peaks below 6234? Please list the countries and corresponding peak values.

NC.A: {Transportation} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

NC.A: {Dining} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.
